humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the largest invasive tumor measures 3.6 cm, which falls within the T2 category of being more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for breast cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the larger lesion in the breast measures 3.6 x 2.2 x 1.5 cm. According to the TNM staging system, a T2 stage is assigned when the tumor is more than 2 cm in size but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
